citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on
01/08/2026. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by calling on the phone and ringing the doorbell. The
registrant was not available for inspection at the time. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on 
01/08/2026. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by calling on the phone and ringing the doorbell. The 
registrant was not available for inspection at the time. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
